A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Pros - 
One of the best lightsaber duels in the franchise. 
Excellent use of color.

Cons -
Everything else: dialogue\, plot holes\, even music\, was complete garbage or forgettable at best. I may seriously never watch another Star Wars movie outside of the original trilogy again (which it also managed to ruin to a degree\, knowing that this is where to story now goes)\, it was that bad.
